mapper.select: select f.food_name as foodName, f.food_price as foodPrice, f.description as foodDescription, f.is_recommend as isRecommend, f.today_sell as todaySell, s.window_name as windowName from food f inner join seller s on s.seller_id = f.seller_id where f.is_delete = 0 limit #{pageNum}, #{pageSize}
select count(*) from food f inner join seller s on s.seller_id = f.seller_id where f.is_delete = 0
